TopicTitle: The cookie director, a story of space exploration

Articles.Content:
I've started a new career from scratch, and instead of beelining for all the big rockets, I decided to log all my achievements and failures and make a story about it. This is the story, in both french and english languages.

More details : http://agifem.over-blog.com/kerbal-space-program.html

The story itself : http://agifem.over-blog.com/ (humble beginning : http://agifem.over-blog.com/2014/12/premier-jour-au-ksc.html)

I try to stick to one post per day rather than the detailed day by day missions; this makes for more interesting reading, I hope.

Feedback is welcome, either here or on the blog.

Excellent stuff!

Conclusion: the KR-1x2 engine works on the ground, albeit at a lower efficiency without fuel.
Edited January 12, 2015 by Sauron

We're proceeding our explorations of the kerbol system with several ambitious missions :

To Mun !

http://agifem.over-blog.com/2015/01/mun-avec-elegance.html

To Jool.

http://agifem.over-blog.com/2015/01/flotte-de-jool.html

The site is still updated daily, with new adventures, new catastrophes, and pretty pictures.

For our second time to Minmus, the KSP is proud to have done such an ambitious mission :

Details here : http://agifem.over-blog.com/2015/02/minmus-autobus.html

More stories can be found before and after that one.
